Package components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AIComponent
    Component for Tracking "AI" using radius and a reference to position component
    AITargetComponent
    Component tracking AI target pos (reference to position component)
    ColliderComponent
    collider component (2D-Shape only)
    Component<T>  
    FightingComponent
    Shows entity is in Fighting Mode and fight
    HealthComponent
    health component
    InventoryComponent
    inv component
    KeyInputComponent
    key input component
    NameComponent
    name component
    NullComponent
    faker component will be instantiated and returned if EntityManager.hasComponent() can not find a component purpose of this is that entity.getComponent(XyzComponent.class).getValue()) does not provoke a NullPointerException when using generic getter NullPointerException with typecasting: System.out.println(((NameComponent) playerECS.getComponent(NameComponent.class)).name); no exception with generic getter: System.out.println(playerECS.getComponent(NameComponent.class).getValue());
    PositionComponent
    position component
    RenderComponent
    render component
    ShapeComponent
    shape component (maybe transfer to texture, because 2D)
    Sprite
    useful?
    StaticComponent
    static component if added, entity will be excluded from updates during game-loop entity will be stored in chunks to reduce object-count on collision detection
    VelocityComponent
    velocity component
    WeaponComponent
    weapon component
